Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Dreamland \Dream"land`\, n. An unreal, delightful country such as in sometimes pictured in dreams; region of fancies; fairyland. [1913 Webster]
[He] builds a bridge from dreamland for his lay. --Lowell. [1913 Webster]
dreamland n : a pleasing country existing only in dreams or imagination [syn: {never-never land}, {dreamworld}]
